dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Stolen Sites Hosting on your Servers]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, July 05, 2005 11:16 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; tjjr615@yahoo.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Stolen Sites Hosting on your Servers]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Stolen Sites Hosting on your Servers
Date: Tue, 5 Jul 2005 08:13:49 -0700 (PDT)
From: TJ Visicaro <tjjr615@yahoo.com>
To: copyright@theplanet.com, support@theplanet.com,
legal-response@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com

I have sent you letters in the past about your Client Matt Anderson.
Well now he has taken it way to far, Since I have sent you a Letter in the
past, Letteing you know about him, And "The Planet" not taking action
ageanst him. I hold you resposable for his lates action. Stealing my Website
content and my SQL Database and placing it on server he rents from you.
Copys All my Graphics.. What is up with that? you Host Hackers sites?

the site I am talking about is

UGLClan.com Owned by TJ Visicaro
My Site

Site Stolen to
uglclan.net.

Matt Anderson.

He has Broken all your Copyright Rules. This is my Last letter, the next one
will be from the Layers.

I expect this site Locked down. the database locked. If you can not comply
with this let me know do I can see other means to stop him.

Thank you
TJ Visicaro

__________________________________________________
Do You Yahoo!?
Tired of spam?  Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around
http://mail.yahoo.com

- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCyrJcvK/XpJs6oyURAtYlAJ4xInvFwWqK3iSfViWkrhZqtmTqqQCcDJvR
RjNncKQzm5jtxqYhcoaCsg0=
=oH/E
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
